mapper.select: select no, due_date, customer_id, delivery_man_id, status d_status, customer_status from delivery

select c.name customer_name, c.area3 address, c.tel customer_tel, d.no, d.due_date, d.customer_id, d.delivery_man_id, case d.status when 0 then '미완료' when 1 then '완료' end d_status, case d.customer_status when 0 then '양호' when 1 then '주의' when 2 then '위험' end customer_status from customer c, delivery d where c.id=d.customer_id and d.no=#{no}

select * from ( select rownum r, c.name customer_name, c.area3 address, c.tel customer_tel, d.no, d.due_date, d.customer_id, d.delivery_man_id, case d.status when 0 then '미완료' when 1 then '완료' end d_status, case d.customer_status when 0 then '양호' when 1 then '주의' when 2 then '위험' end customer_status from customer c, delivery d ) where r>(#{page}-1)*50 and r<=(#{page}*50)

select count(*) from ( select c.name customer_name, c.area3 address, c.tel customer_tel, d.no, d.due_date, d.customer_id, d.delivery_man_id, case d.status when 0 then '미완료' when 1 then '완료' end d_status, case d.customer_status when 0 then '양호' when 1 then '주의' when 2 then '위험' end customer_status from customer c, delivery d where c.id=d.customer_id and d.no like '%'||#{vo.no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and d.customer_id like '%'||#{vo.customer_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and c.name like '%'||#{vo.customer_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and c.tel like '%'||#{vo.customer_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and d.delivery_man_id like '%'||#{vo.delivery_man_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and c.area3 like '%'||#{vo.address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and d.status like #{vo.d_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and d.customer_status like '%'||#{vo.customer_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and d.due_date >= to_date(#{startdate},'yyyy-MM-dd') and d.due_date <= to_date(#{enddate}||' 23:59:59','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') )

select * from ( select rownum r, c.name customer_name, c.area3 address, c.tel customer_tel, d.no, d.due_date, d.customer_id, d.delivery_man_id, case d.status when 0 then '미완료' when 1 then '완료' end d_status, case d.customer_status when 0 then '양호' when 1 then '주의' when 2 then '위험' end customer_status from customer c, delivery d where c.id=d.customer_id and d.no like '%'||#{vo.no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and d.customer_id like '%'||#{vo.customer_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and c.name like '%'||#{vo.customer_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and c.tel like '%'||#{vo.customer_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and d.delivery_man_id like '%'||#{vo.delivery_man_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and c.area3 like '%'||#{vo.address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and d.status like #{vo.d_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and d.customer_status like '%'||#{vo.customer_status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%' and d.due_date >= to_date(#{startdate},'yyyy-MM-dd') and d.due_date <= to_date(#{enddate}||' 23:59:59','yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') ) where r>(#{page}-1)*50 and r<=(#{page}*50)
